metadata.title: Contact Us | Cursuri
metadata.description: Get in touch with us. We'd love to hear from you about your learning journey or answer any questions you might have.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Have a question about our courses or need support? We're here to help! Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

placeholders.name: Your full name
placeholders.message: Tell us how we can help you...

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.description: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days.

globalSupport.title: Global Support
globalSupport.description: We provide support to students worldwide in English and Romanian.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our courses. If you're not satisfied with your learning experience, contact us for a full refund.

mobile.question: Can I access courses on mobile?
mobile.answer: Absolutely! Our platform is fully responsive and works seamlessly on all devices, including smartphones and tablets.

certificates.question: Do you provide certificates?
certificates.answer: Yes, you'll receive a certificate of completion for each course you finish. These certificates can be shared on LinkedIn and other professional platforms.
